entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Candiac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:58 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
